fields.Title of Presentation: The Mythic Marie Curie: The Making and Re-making of the Image of the Most Famous Female Scientist in History
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Transmission and Transgression: 4th International Polish Studies Conference
fields.Sponsoring Organization: The Hejna Family Chair in the History of Poland and The Hejna Family Chair in Polish Language and Literature, The School of Literatures, Cultural Studies and Linguistics at the University of Illinois at Chicago, and the Consul General of the Republic of Poland in Chicago
fields.Description/Abstract: Survey of the image of Marie Curie in history and culture
